ack.title: Funding information
ack.p: D. A. C. acknowledges funding from the Norwegian Research Council, grant no. 220829. O. B. B., V. E., A. R. and P. A. K. report no funding source other than their employer. These funders had no role in the study design, data collection, data analysis, data interpretation, writing of the report nor the decision to submit the paper for publication. The corresponding author had full access to the study data and had final responsibility for the decision to submit to publication.
